com.teamalasca.admissioncontroller.interfaces

Interface AdmissionRequestHandlerI

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdmissionController, AdmissionRequestOutboundPort

    public interface AdmissionRequestHandlerI
    The interface AdmissionRequestHandlerI defines the methods that must be implemented by a component to handle an admission request.
    Author:
    Clément George, Mohamed Amine Corchi, Victor Nea

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Handle an admission request.

      Handle an admission request and notify.
